    • Method Detail

      • getDetailMV

        public QQMusicDetailVideo getDetailMV(String vid,
                                      String cookie)
        Get detail video information according to its mvid.

        Get detail video information according to its vid.

        Specified by:
        getDetailMV in interface QQMusicMVService
        Parameters:
        vid - The vid of the mv.
        cookie - Your qq music cookie.
        Returns:
        The detail information of the mv vid.
        API Note:
        GET /mv?id=vid

      • getMVsLink

        public Map<String,List<String>> getMVsLink(String vids,
                                           String cookie)
        Get the url for the mv(s) vids.

        Get the url for the mv(s) vids.

        Specified by:
        getMVsLink in interface QQMusicMVService
        Parameters:
        vids - The vid of the mv, multi vid separated by comma.
        cookie - Your qq music cookie.
        Returns:
        A map which key is the vid and value is a list of urls of this mv.
        API Note:
        GET /mv/url?id=vids

      • getRelatedVideos

        public List<BasicVideo> getRelatedVideos(Integer songId,
                                         String cookie)
        Get all the related basic videos information according to its songId.

        Get all the related basic videos information according to its songId.

        Specified by:
        getRelatedVideos in interface QQMusicMVService
        Parameters:
        songId - The song's id.
        cookie - Your qq music cookie.
        Returns:
        A list of basic video information related to the song.
